casebody.data:
PAULISON, Respondent, v. GATES et al., Appellants, (two cases.) (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. April 17, 1893.) Action by John P. Paulison against Benjamin Gates and others, (two cases.)

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and O’BRIEN and FOLLETT, JJ.

Campard & Reville, for appellant. Gerardus C. King, for respondent.

No opinion. Motion granted, with §10 costs.
